page.title: 07FARMING IN KILREA
page.content: {FARMING:}ONE FRIDAY OUR CLASS WENT ON A VISIT TO A FARM IN THE KILREA AREA.IT WAS A MIXED FARM OF 100 ACRES. {CATTLE:}THE FARMER HAD OVER 100 COWS ON HIS HOLDING.IN WINTER THE COWS ARE FED ON SILAGE.SILAGE IS A MIXTURE OF GRASS AND TREACLE. {PIGS:}THE FARMER KEEPS BETWEEN 500 AND 600 PIGS.PIGS ARE FED ON MEAL AND WHEY. {CROPS:}POTATOES ARE GROWN FOR HOME USE.BARLEY AND SILAGE ARE GROWN AS WINTER FODDER.THE BARLEY IS KEPT IN A GRAIN STORE AT AN EVEN TEMPERATURE.WHEN MEN GO INTO THE STORE MASKS HAVE TO BE WORN FOR SAFETY REASONS.THE MASKS PREVENT GRAIN DUST FROM ENTERING THE LUNGS.
